reviewtext: This is a bag for professionals!!people, this can easily fit 2 lenses, a slr body, battery charger, 2-3 cords, a few filters,even the manual and still have room for more :) and the padding aint that bad either..the build-quality is excellent and overall I would definitely recommend it if u really intend to carry a lot of stuff or else go for something smaller.Overall,a great product.
